text: Zorro, The Gay Blade is a 1981 American Mexican adventure comedy movie directed by Peter Medak and stars George Hamilton, Lauren Hutton, Ron Liebman, Brenda Vaccaro. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for one Razzie in 1982. ==Other websites== * * Category:1981 adventure movies Category:1981 comedy movies Category:1980s LGBT movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Mexican adventure movies Category:Mexican comedy movies Category:Mexican LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Peter Medak
title: Zorro, The Gay Blade
